text: A survey Involving 30 students Is done to determine which study aids students prefer. The following is found* 13 students prefer text books, 20 students prefer study guides, and 17 students prefer online lessons (It doesn't necessarily mean that the students prefer one aid only ) Furthermore 8 students prefer text books and online lessons, 7 students prefer study guides and online lessons, and 10 students prefer text books and study guides () Complete the Venn diagram below with the given information, and then answer the rest of the questions (5)
